üè∑Ô∏è"A rich, gelatinous, creamy and sweet flan with subtle caramel. Making a delightful addition to cakes, pastries and in place of or in combination with creams!." - wonderflavours.com

Suggested Dilution Ratio: 1-4% | [Link: Flan SC](https://www.wonderflavours.com/collections/super-concentrated-flavours/products/flan-sc)

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

Aroma Stick: Sweet aroma of Caramelized Brown Sugar (almost "syrupy") upfront & mild notes of a milky dairy cream or custard

\_ \_ \_ \_ \_\_ \_ \_ \_ \_

Single Flavor Test:  3%

60/40 | 0 Nic | Single 316L SS Fused Clapton | TigerTek Morphe RDA | Organic Japanese Cotton

​

1 Week Steep

​

‚ñ∫Tester Bottle

\- Aroma: Aroma Intensity ‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è

\- Description: Caramel / Brown Sugar & Mild Dairy

\- Knuckle: Milky Dairy, Caramel & Toasted Brown Sugar

​

‚ñ∫Vape

\- Flavor Intensity: ‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è

\- Sweetness: ‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è

\- Flavor Description: Natural. Milky & Moderately Thick Buttery Cooked Dairy (Dominate) married to a Mild Cr√®me Brule-like Burnt Brown Sugar and softer hints of a Syrupy Caramel. Body & Mouth Feel: Full Bodied ‚Ä¢ Smooth and Fluffy Mouthfeel

​

‚ñ∫ Notes

\- Dairy is similar to a Cooked Custard but ‚ÄúMilk‚Äù flavor dominates

2 Week Steep

​

‚ñ∫Vape - Noticeable Changes Wk 1

\- Flavor Intensity: ‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è

\- Sweetness: ‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è

\- Flavor Description: Thick Dairy ‚ÄúFlan‚Äù flvr is Milder & less dense ‚Ä¢ Butter flvr ‚Üì; Overlapped by Sweet Smoky Caramelized Brown Sugar

​

‚ñ∫ Notes

\- Heavy Butter / Syrupy Caramel Weaker than Wk1

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

3 Week Steep

​

‚ñ∫Vape: Light Changes from Wk 2

\- Flavor Intensity: ‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è‚Üì

\- Sweetness: ‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è‚Üì

\- Flavor Description: Mild. Soft and Somewhat Fluffy Custard; covered by a Thinner, Lightly Smoky\* Caramelized Brown Sugar (dominate). Medium Bodied with a Rounded & Smooth Mouthfeel.

​

‚ñ∫ Notes

\- Off Notes: No Identifiable Off Notes | Soft Butryic Acid No longer Identifiable.

\- Week 3: Intensity, Sweetness, Body & Mouthfeel ‚Üì. Overall Lighter body & mouthfeel. Heavy Caramel & Buttery Flavor no longer Identifiable = replaced with Lightly Smoky Caramelized Brown Sugar.

​

\- Uses: As a Softer & Lighter Flan/Cr√®me Brule flavor or Supporting flavor to denser & heavier Custard, Cr√®me Brule, or Flan Flavors

‚ñ∫Mixing % Estimate\*
